mapper.select: SELECT T2.user_id, T5.store_name, T5.store_picture_url, T6.rating, T4.menu_name, T6.content, T6.created_date FROM orders T1 LEFT JOIN users T2 ON T1.user_id = T2.user_id LEFT JOIN order_menu T3 ON T1.order_id = T3.order_id LEFT JOIN menu T4 ON T3.menu_id = T4.menu_id LEFT JOIN store T5 ON T4.store_id = T5.store_id LEFT JOIN review T6 ON T1.user_id = T6.user_id WHERE T2.login_id = #{login_id} ORDER BY T6.created_date DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(review_id, user_id, store_name, menu_name, rating, content, created_date ) VALUES(#{review_id}, #{user_id}, #{store_name}, #{menu_name}, #{rating}, #{content}, ,NOW(),)
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET user_id=#{user_id}, content=#{content} WHERE id = #{review_id}
